author: sfgate.com
title: Emma Stone’s Ghostly Dance Through the Queen Mary
text:
“What Just Happened”: Emma Stone dances her way through Arcade Fire front-man Will Butler’s new video for his song, “Anna”. In the video, Emma gracefully moves through the Queen Mary as the famed Lady in White, a spirit that supposedly haunts th
Media: Hearstdigitalstudios.com . Related Stories Tina Fey Hilariously Finds Friends with ‘Billy on the Street’ Before 'The Catch', the Niners whipped the Cowboys - This Forgotten Day in S.F.
